mg.mapviewer.graph

Class GNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • mg.mapviewer.model.PointModelImpl
      • mg.mapviewer.graph.GNode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<PointModel>, PointModel

    public class GNode
extends PointModelImpl
implements PointModel
    This class is the basis for a node in a graph.
